alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Chambers; Fort Bend; Galveston; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:27PM CDT until June 21 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Galveston County in southeastern Texas... Eastern Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... Southwestern Chambers County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 927 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Barrett to Bellaire to near East Bernard, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, League City, Sugar Land, Baytown, Missouri City, Texas City, Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, southeastern Rosenberg, Alvin, Dickinson, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, West University Place, La Marque, Santa Fe and Seabrook. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brazoria; Chambers; Fort Bend; Galveston; Harris
